ygData.subject: Re: Wish List Part 1
ygData.msgSnippet: I will NOT drag this topic on [I expect by Monday to switch to part 2].  Frankly, I can t wait to get to discussions about part 4. Mouse-oriented.  definitely.

I will NOT drag this topic on [I expect by Monday to switch to part 
2].  Frankly, I can't wait to get to discussions about part 4.

Mouse-oriented.  definitely.  My second biggest complaint is setting 
level numbers.  This really gets to be problematic when you are 
getting ready to set the exits for a scenario.  A copy-and-paste 
feature for objects on the grid would be fairly usefull at times.
